https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iulzH4uVGpaSfaZMaT56OfBKS5.jpg Behind the Scenes: Making of Halo 2 is a short film documenting Bungie's production and development of the game Halo 2. It was released with the Limited Collector's Edition of the game. Behind the Scenes: Making of Halo 2
